item.title: CVE-2024-35686|2024-08-18T21:54:35.348Z -- automattic -- sensei%20lms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Automattic Sensei LMS, Automattic Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses).This issue affects Sensei LMS: from n/a through 4.23.1; Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses): from n/a through 4.23.1.1.23.1.
